channel.title: Week-04s on Miles Drake's CodeClan Homework
channel.description: Recent content in Week-04s on Miles Drake's CodeClan Homework

item.title: Decathlon Analysis
item.description: Who had the longest long jump seen in the data? decathlon_analysis$long_jump_max <- decathlon_data %>% filter( event_name == "Long Jump" ) %>% select( name, event_score ) %>% arrange( desc(event_score) ) %>% head(1) ## # A tibble: 1 x 2 ## name event_score ## <chr> <dbl> ## 1 Clay 7.96 The longest recorded long jump in this data set was achieved by Clay, with a distance of 7.96 m. What was the average 100m time in each competition?

item.title: Dog Owners' Survey
item.description: The dog owners’ survey is a free-hand data set, comprised of British dog owners. This data set collates the self-reported size, sex, and age of their dogs; the amount that they spend on dog food (in GBP); and the respondant’s contact information. Complete Data Set ## # A tibble: 298 x 9 ## id title first_name last_name email amount_spent_on~ dog_size dog_male ## <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <lgl> ## 1 1 Mrs Frasquito Dene fden~ 80.
